participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Disciplined and reserved, but with a strong sense of duty.
participant_1.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. i am in the army.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and sociable, with a passion for teaching and celebrating life.
participant_2.background: i'm getting married in the spring. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i love eating out with friends. i'm 24 years old. my favorite singer is taylor swift.
